description:
Made in Japan, Sacai's knee socks are crafted of black, white, and red cotton. The avant-garde label knits one sock at the side with "Stasis As To Vector" lettering and the other sock with "All In Due Course" lettering, both of which reference a 2012 piece by New York-based artist Lawrence Weiner.White rib-knit cuff.Red toe and heel.Available in Black/White/Red.100% cotton.Machine wash.Made in Japan.
